Articles.Content:
I have played since today without any problems. But today the game had extreme lags, maybe 5fps ( I didn't count). When the engines are running or parachutes are open it's all fine and smooth.

Controls are radial on Xbox One X. I have deleted the Savegame, but after one start it happens again. Power off the Console with no effect.

I hope you can help and sorry for the bad English.
